alert.note: Alert for Fort Tejon; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 30 at 12:35AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT FOR THE KERN COUNTY MOUNTAINS UNTIL 10 PM PDT MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES. .Critical fire weather conditions will occur in the Kern County mountains through this evening. Northeasterly winds and relative humidity values of 10 to 15 percent are forecast. The strongest winds are anticipated through this morning, with sustained northeast winds of 20 to 30 mph, with frequent gusts near 40 mph. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR GUSTY NORTHEAST WINDS AND VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 595, 596, AND 597... * AFFECTED AREA...The Kern County mountains. * WIND...The strongest winds are forecast through this morning, with sustained northeast winds of 20 to 30 mph, with frequent gusts near 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 10 to 15 percent through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fort Tejon; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area
